project.name: weld-jsf-login
project.description: The example demonstrates user login/logout for an application that uses JSF. It will create the weld-jsf-login project in your workspace.

fix.property: This project example requires JBoss Application Server 6.0

project.importTypeDescription: The project example requires the m2eclipse-core, m2eclipse-wtp and JBoss Maven Project Examples feature.
